thread.title: Chris Pratt and Aziz Ansari Collaboreate With Amy Schumer and Jennifer Lawrence for Short Film
thread.title_full: Chris Pratt and Aziz Ansari Collaboreate With Amy Schumer and Jennifer Lawrence for Short Film

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Chris Pratt and Aziz Ansari Collaboreate With Amy Schumer and Jennifer Lawrence for Short Film
text:
Comments Having a good time together, the four best friends make a very short film entitled 'Hey Guys', in which Pratt and Ansari star with all of them involved as writers. 
Chris Pratt , Amy Schumer , Jennifer Lawrence and Aziz Ansari always find a way to sneak some fun moments into their busy schedules. The Hollywood favorites recently spent their time together to make a very short film in which Pratt and Ansari star. Ansari posted the short film on Instagram and captioned it, "CHRIS PRATT AND AZIZ ANSARI present... 'hi guys'." He also mentioned that the movie was directed by Lawrence with Schumer involved as director of photography. All of them were mentioned as screenwriters. Schumer's sister Kim Caramele was also present and credited as writer. The video shows Pratt standing behind Ansari, who is swinging on a swing and repeatedly saying "hi guys" as he waves his hand in front of the camera. Pratt looks annoyed with Ansari, but he keeps his face straight. A video posted by @azizansari on Oct 4, 2015 at 2:28pm PDT According to sources, all of those craziness took place in Atlanta, where Pratt and Lawrence shot their upcoming film, " Passengers (2016) ". Schumer and Ansari were there for a stop on their tour with the Oddball Comedy Festival. Schumer also posted another video which gives a look at Ansari and his team delivering a very loud wakeup call for Caramele. Ansari enters Caramele's room and turns on the light as he yells at her, "Let's go." "This morning @azizansari and Jen woke up an angel #sleepmanager," Schumer captioned the video. A video posted by @amyschumer on Oct 4, 2015 at 3:09pm PDT
